extensionAttribute.description: This attribute verifies that the setting "Auto Logout" is disabled. This extension attribute requires this preference be set using Managed Preferences (MCX).
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh appDomain=".GlobalPreferences" keyName="com.apple.autologout.AutoLogOutDelay" desiredValue="0" currentUser=`last -1 -t console | awk '{print $1}'` result="`dscl . mcxread /Users/$currentUser \"$appDomain\" \"$keyName\" |grep Value:| sed 's/Value\: //g'`" echo $tmpResult if [ "$result" == "$desiredValue" ]; then echo "<result>Pass ($result)</result>" else echo "<result>Fail ($result)</result>" fi
